Test Name: Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) Analysis of VWF and GP1BA Genes
Purpose: To detect and characterize variants in VWF and GP1BA genes for the diagnosis of Von Willebrand Disease.
Equipment: NGS sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), PCR machine/thermocycler, microcentrifuge, gel electrophoresis unit, quantification instruments (Qubit, Bioanalyzer)
